nodes.text: Nooli was a world located in the Nooli system in the Noolian sector in the Mid Rim.

Following the fall of the Confederate planet Ando at the end of the Clone Wars, Separatist Aqualish and Harch invaded Nooli, Galboron, and several worlds in the outskirts of Bothan Space in 18 BBY. They were eventually defeated by the Galactic Empire at the Battle of Galboron. The conflict was named Noolian Crisis after the planet Nooli.
